text: The Shangri-Las were an American pop girl group of the 1960s. They released their first album Leader of the Pack in 1965. Their 1964 single "Leader of the Pack" was number one in the United States. The members of the group were sisters Betty and Mary Weiss, with twins, Margie and Mary-Ann Ganser. Their first hit recording was "Remember (Walking In The Sand)" (1964) which reached number 5 in the US and number 14 in the UK. ==References== Category:1963 establishments in the United States Category:American girl groups Category:Musical groups established in 1963
title: The Shangri-Las
